part_2.name: Hunger Switch
part_2.effect: The Pokémon changes its form, alternately becoming hungry and full each turn.

part_2.name: Hustle
part_2.effect: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

part_2.name: Hydration
part_2.effect: Heals status conditions if it's raining.

part_2.name: Hyper Cutter
part_2.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering the Pokémon's Attack stat.

part_2.name: Ice Body
part_2.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

part_2.name: Ice Face
part_2.effect: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

part_2.name: Ice Scales
part_2.effect: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

part_2.name: Illuminate
part_2.effect: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

part_2.name: Illusion
part_2.effect: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

part_2.name: Immunity
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

part_2.name: Imposter
part_2.effect: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

part_2.name: Infiltrator
part_2.effect: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

part_2.name: Innards Out
part_2.effect: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit for HP equal to the amount of damage dealt.

part_2.name: Inner Focus
part_2.effect: Protects the Pokémon from flinching.

part_2.name: Insomnia
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

part_2.name: Intimidate
part_2.effect: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat.

part_2.name: Intrepid Sword
part_2.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when it enters a battle.

part_2.name: Iron Barbs
part_2.effect: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact.

part_2.name: Iron Fist
part_2.effect: Powers up punching moves.

part_2.name: Justified
part_2.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Dark-type move.

part_2.name: Keen Eye
part_2.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

part_2.name: Klutz
part_2.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

part_2.name: Leaf Guard
part_2.effect: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

part_2.name: Levitate
part_2.effect: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

part_2.name: Libero
part_2.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

part_2.name: Light Metal
part_2.effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

part_2.name: Lightning Rod
part_2.effect: Draws in all Electric-type moves to boost its own Special Attack stat.

part_2.name: Limber
part_2.effect: Protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

part_2.name: Lingering Aroma
part_2.effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

part_2.name: Liquid Ooze
part_2.effect: Damages attackers using any draining move.

part_2.name: Liquid Voice
part_2.effect: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

part_2.name: Long Reach
part_2.effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

part_2.name: Magic Bounce
part_2.effect: Reflects status moves.

part_2.name: Magic Guard
part_2.effect: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

part_2.name: Magician
part_2.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

part_2.name: Magma Armor
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

part_2.name: Magnet Pull
part_2.effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

part_2.name: Marvel Scale
part_2.effect: Boosts the Defense stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

part_2.name: Mega Launcher
part_2.effect: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

part_2.name: Merciless
part_2.effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

part_2.name: Mimicry
part_2.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

part_2.name: Minus
part_2.effect: Boosts the Special Attack stat of a Pokémon with Plus or Minus.

part_2.name: Mirror Armor
part_2.effect: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

part_2.name: Misty Surge
part_2.effect: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

part_2.name: Mold Breaker
part_2.effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

part_2.name: Moody
part_2.effect: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

part_2.name: Motor Drive
part_2.effect: Boosts Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

part_2.name: Moxie
part_2.effect: Boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

part_2.name: Multiscale
part_2.effect: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

part_2.name: Multitype
part_2.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the Plate it holds.

part_2.name: Mummy
part_2.effect: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.

part_2.name: Mycelium Might
part_2.effect: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by an opponent’s Ability.

part_2.name: Natural Cure
part_2.effect: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

part_2.name: Neuroforce
part_2.effect: Powers up super-effective moves.

part_2.name: Neutralizing Gas
part_2.effect: Suppresses the Abilities of all Pokémon on the field.

part_2.name: No Guard
part_2.effect: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

part_2.name: Normalize
part_2.effect: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type.

part_2.name: Oblivious
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated or taunted.

part_2.name: Orichalcum Pulse
part_2.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse felt across the land also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

part_2.name: Overcoat
part_2.effect: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

part_2.name: Overgrow
part_2.effect: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

part_2.name: Own Tempo
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

part_2.name: Parental Bond
part_2.effect: Parent and child each attack.

part_2.name: Pastel Veil
part_2.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

part_2.name: Perish Body
part_2.effect: When the Pokémon is hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will both faint in three turns unless they switch out of battle.

part_2.name: Pickpocket
part_2.effect: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

part_2.name: Pickup
part_2.effect: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

part_2.name: Pixilate
part_2.effect: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves and get a power boost.

part_2.name: Plus
part_2.effect: Boosts the Special Attack stat of a Pokémon with Plus or Minus.

part_2.name: Poison Heal
part_2.effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

part_2.name: Poison Point
part_2.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

part_2.name: Poison Touch
part_2.effect: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

part_2.name: Power Construct
part_2.effect: Other cells gather to aid when the Pokémon's HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

part_2.name: Power of Alchemy
part_2.effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

part_2.name: Power Spot
part_2.effect: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

part_2.name: Prankster
part_2.effect: Gives priority to a status move.

part_2.name: Pressure
part_2.effect: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

part_2.name: Primordial Sea
part_2.effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type moves.

part_2.name: Prism Armor
part_2.effect: Reduces the power of super-effective attacks taken.

part_2.name: Propeller Tail
part_2.effect: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves, for example, Storm Drain.

part_2.name: Protean
part_2.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

part_2.name: Protosynthesis
part_2.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

part_2.name: Psychic Surge
part_2.effect: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

part_2.name: Punk Rock
part_2.effect: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

part_2.name: Pure Power
part_2.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.

part_2.name: Purifying Salt
part_2.effect: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

part_2.name: Queenly Majesty
part_2.effect: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

part_2.name: Quick Draw
part_2.effect: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

part_2.name: Quick Feet
part_2.effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
